Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Support for interfaces used with IPartitionResolver is now obsolete. It's recommended that you use partitioned collections for higher storage and throughput.")

Docs.summary: An interface used by the to partition data using consistent hashing in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

remarks.para: Support for interfaces used with IPartitionResolver is now obsolete. It's recommended that you use Partitioned Collections for higher storage and throughput.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] ComputeHash(unsigned int8[] key) cil managed
Public Function ComputeHash (key As Byte()) As Byte()

Docs.param: A key represented by an array of bytes
Docs.summary: Hashes an array of bytes into a new array of bytes that represents the output hash in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.returns: An array of bytes that represents the output hash.
